Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a mental health coordinator to inform city employees about mental health support and services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a mental health coordinator to inform city employees about mental health support and services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to report on referrals to assisted outpatient treatment programs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to report on referrals to assisted outpatient treatment programs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the City to recognize November as Veteran Appreciation Month in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognize November as Veteran Appreciation Month in New York City.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
